response.overview: At the annual Qingyun Conference in the Hexu Six Realms, Ji Bo Zai, a warrior from the Jixing Abyss with a past as a convict, defeated Ming Yi, the cold warrior goddess who had reigned supreme for seven consecutive years. Overnight, Ji Bo Zai became the hottest new star in Jixing Abyss. Meanwhile, Ming Yi, hiding her true identity, disguised herself as a dancer to get close to Ji Bo Zai. Under their carefully crafted personas, the two engaged in a thrilling dance of deception and attraction.  Adapted from the web novel "Ru Qing Yun" (入青云) by Bai Lu Cheng Shuang (白鹭成双).
response.title: 入青云
